Officially, Mr. Paul Bremer reported to Mr. Donald Rumsfeld . But he viewed himself as the president's man, had a background in the State Department, and a relationship with Condoleezza Rice , says Mr. Donald Rumsfeld . So Mr. Paul Bremer chose what guidance he preferred, which Mr. Donald Rumsfeld describes as the equivalent of having`` four or eight hands on the steering wheel.'' an asset likely to carry over even if the Mubarak government falls, Parker says.`` He is not the kind of man to have nurtured candidates for his own eventual replacement,'' Parker told me yesterday. So even the act of taking a job promotion from a dying regime, in the middle of the crisis, may not have hurt his chances to continue running Egypt's antiquities. Going forward, we remain committed to aggressive investment in both our people and our products as we pursue an innovation agenda. Announcing financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2010. Google reported revenues of$ 7.29 billion for the quarter ended September 30, 2010, an increase of 23% compared to the third quarter of 2009
